2 - twinkle the horse arm make 2 with contrasting color cc chain 2 round 1 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round round 2 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet 12 single_crochet slip_stitch to join this round fasten_off with mc round 1 -
